parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time for querying metric data. The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: GroupByLabels
parameters.description: The one or more keys used for grouping. Separate multiple keys with commas (,). Example: "app,clusterId,tenantId".

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description: A string of key-value pairs separated with commas (,). Each key and its value are separated with a colon (\:). Example: "app:OB,clusterId:ob\*\*\*\*\*,tenantId:t\*\*\*\*\*\*,serverId:\*\*\*\*\*,zoneId:cn-hangzhou-j". The string can contain only the following fixed keys: * app: the application type. At present, only OceanBase Database is supported. * clusterId: the ID of the OceanBase cluster. * tenantId: the ID of the OceanBase Database tenant. * zoneId: the ID of the zone. * serverId: the ID of the OBServer node. | app:OB,clusterId:ob\*\*\*

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The length of the data array returned after sorting.

parameters.name: MetricScope
parameters.description: The dimensions of the performance metric.

parameters.name: Metrics
parameters.description: The metrics. Separate multiple metrics with commas (,). Example: "sql_all_count,sql_all_rt...".

parameters.name: ReplicaType
parameters.description:
The type of the replica. Node filtering conditions are configured based on the replica type when you query the monitoring data of the OceanBase cluster. 
* By default, the replica type is not specified when you query the monitoring data of OceanBase clusters or the access proxy. If you do not specify the replica type when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of all nodes is queried. 
* If you set the replica type to FULL when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of only the full-featured replica nodes is queried. 
* If you set the replica type to READONLY when you query the monitoring data of an OceanBase cluster, the monitoring data of only the read-only replica nodes is queried.

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description:
The sorting rule. Valid values: 
* ASC: in ascending order 
* DESC: in descending order

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time for querying metric data. The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
